price: 161. Ceux qui ont mécru et sont morts mécréants ont sur eux la malédiction d’Allah, des Anges et de l’humanité entière.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū wamātū wahum kuffārun ulāika ʿalayhim laʿnatu al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
